snippet.title: THE WEIGHT OF LIFE - Prologue [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
The trailer for the prologue of a brand new series from Roadkill Badger Productions - THE WEIGHT OF LIFE: AN INTERACTIVE DEATH GAME OF JUDGEMENT.

18 participants have been invited to compete in the Judge's Game, all playing to see their wish fulfilled. Little do they know, that the game will determine whose life holds the most value. Who lives and who dies rests entirely in your judgement, and in the weight of life.

For updates on this project's development, follow the official account on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WoL_Judgement
Or, join the Roadkill Badger Productions Discord Server: https://discord.gg/JnTTb8rvz4
